original_text: “But woe to you who are rich, for you have received your consolation.
korean_text: 그러나 화 있을진저 너희 부요한 자여 너희는 너희의 위로를 이미 받았도다

sentences.original_text: But woe to you who are rich,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희 부요한 자들에게 화가 있으니

sentences.original_text: for you have received your consolation.
